Reviews.Title: “Very good hotel”
Reviews.Author: Fly L
Reviews.Content: istanbul january stayed samir hotel location 10 min walking sultan hassan aya sofia grand bazzar alot restaurant staff nice helpful specially mustafa info clean nice booked tour island bit expensive time highly recommended

Reviews.Title: “Clean, central, but overpriced and basic”
Reviews.Author: GarryOwen78
Reviews.Content: normally hotel average rating 80 euros night severely overpriced 15 minute walk main sites wouldnt choose teeming lowquality clothes retailers continually pester passerby hotel clean obviously thats merit fourstar rating eu standards 23 star example stayed 2star ibis france nicer wifi didnt enormously inconvenient meant hunting wifi elsewhere checking required pay nights upfront unusual requirement sends bad signal guest bit gloomy window quiet narrow street view speak staff actually fine spoke english theres fivestar review below written party cant prove fairly send alarm bells ringing

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location with healthy breakfast”
Reviews.Author: Christer L
Reviews.Content: hotel excellent location value considering rate clean english staff friendly helpful breakfast buffet basic stuff ie bacon greasy sausages lots fresh vegetables hotel perfect home base exploring istanbul

Reviews.Title: “very nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: keitthmmm
Reviews.Content: excellent reception service professional friendly staff especially manager ahmet comfortable clean location walking distance major beautiful hotel warm welcoming atmosphere enjoyed buffet breakfast local cuisine definitely stay thank keith

Reviews.Title: “Great Location but ordinary hotel”
Reviews.Author: zaminabs
Reviews.Content: impressed called 4 star hotel double 26 inch tv corner breakfast limited turkish food staff restaurant eager plates havenâ€™t finished angry staff local hotel clean emphasis hygiene especially bathroom city view standard hotel opposite 1 person floor access wireless time overall disappointment

Reviews.Content: travelled istanbul times rate samir hotel stayed hotel located relatively quiet street overlooking street interior patio hotel spacious extremely appointed beds super comfy huge rating cleanliness breakfast excellent service enjoyed relaxing roof top overlooking view found incredibly charming hotel lovely space dining comfortable sofas hang hotel located heart sultanahmet minutes major attractions makes samir hotel truly special warmth friendliness staff level service staff delightful thoughtful trying respond requests special thanks kadir absolute gem welcoming helpful goes ensure hotel guests stay am definitely planning stay samir hotel visit istanbul highly recommend
